entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023
